project.description: This gets current config.xml for all jobs.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
#cd ../../ #cd ${JENKINS_HOME} tar zvcf jobs.tar.gz ${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/*/config.xml tar -tvf jobs.tar.gz #echo "${WORKSPACE}" #cp jobs.tar.gz ${WORKSPACE} #if [[ $branch != 'master' ]]; then # cd ${WORKSPACE} # git clone -b ${branch} https://github.com/hms-dbmi/avillachlab-jenkins # tar zxvf jobs.tar.gz -C avillachlab-jenkins/jenkins-docker/ #else # echo "committing to master is not allowed" #fi
